name: Seungryul Baek
content: Seungryul BaekSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationSeungryul Baek ( 백승렬 )Associate Professor UNIST Vision and Learning (UVL) LabArtificial Intelligent Graduate School (AIGS) & Department of Computer Science and Engineering College of Information and Biotechnology Ulsan National Institute of Science and Technology (UNIST)Email: srbaek@unist.ac.kr (official), sryul.baek@gmail.com (personal)Links: [Cirriculum Vitae], [Lab Homepage: https://vision.unist.ac.kr],  [YouTube channel], [Google scholar] 50 UNIST-gil, Ulju, Ulsan, South Korea, 44919Brief Bio: I am an associate professor, jointly affiliated to the Artificial Intelligence Graduate School (AIGS) and Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at UNIST where I joined in April 2020. I obtained BS (2009) and MS (2011) degrees from Dept. of Electrical Engineering at KAIST and Ph.D. degree (2020) from Dept. of Electrical and Electronic Engineering at Imperial College London. During my Ph.D., I have interned at INRIA Sophia Antipolis (2019.6-2019.8.). Before joining Ph.D., I was an employee at DMC Research Center of Samsung Electronics for four years (2011.2.-2015.2.).Our lab holds a fund for multiple Innocore PostDoc positions (salary: 90 million KRW/yr for max 5 yrs). Please contact me, if interested in.Our lab opens a new branch in Centum AI Convergence Research Center (Haeundae Busan) since Sep. 2025.Research InterestsComputer Vision and Machine Learning (Deep Learning).3D Pose Estimation/Mesh Reconstruction, Action/Gesture Recognition, Semantic Segmentation, Object Recognition.EducationPh.D. at Dept. of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Imperial College London, London, United Kingdom.Advisor: Tae-Kyun KimSep. 2015 ~ Mar. 2020.M.S. at Dept. of Electrical Engineering, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST), Daejeon, South Korea.Advisor: Chang D. YooFeb. 2009 ~ Feb. 2011.B.S. at Dept. of Electrical Engineering, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST), Daejeon, South Korea.Mar. 2004 ~ Jan. 2009.Work ExperiencesAssociate Professor, Ulsan National Institute of Science and Technology (UNIST), Ulsan, South Korea.AI Graduate School and Dept. of CSEMar. 2024 ~ (Present).Assistant Professor, Ulsan National Institute of Science and Technology (UNIST), Ulsan, South Korea.AI Graduate School and Dept. of CSEApr. 2020 ~ Feb. 2024.Student Internship, INRIA Sophia Antipolis, Valbonne, France.Advisor: François BrémondJun. 2019 ~ Aug. 2019.Computer Vision Engineer, Samsung Electronics, DMC Research, Suwon, South Korea.This job is taken as the alternative to the military duties in South Korea.Feb. 2011 ~ Feb. 2015.PublicationsYoojin Jang, Junsu Kim, Ha Yeon Kim, Eun-Ki Lee, Eun-Sol Kim, Seungryul Baek, Jaejun Yoo, "B-RIGHT: Benchmark Re-evaluation for Integrity in Generalized Human-Object Interaction Testing",  in Proc. of British Machine Vision Conference (BMVC), Sheffield, UK, 2025 (accepted).Taehoon Kim, Jongwook Choi, Yonghyun Jeong, Haeun Noh, Jaejun Yoo, Seungryul Baek, Jongwon Choi, "Beyond Spatial Frequency: Pixel-wise Temporal Frequency-based Deepfake Video Detection", in Proc. of IEEE Int.
